current.post_checkout_info_content: Add your own custom content to explain your processes...
current.post_checkout_info_success: Thanks for sharing with us. We wish you already a wonderful wedding ahead.

settings.title: Do you ship overseas?
settings.answer: Yes, we ship all over the world. Shipping costs will apply, and will be added at checkout. We run discounts and promotions all year, so stay tuned for exclusive deals.

settings.title: How long will it take to get my order?
settings.answer: It depends on where you are. Orders processed here will take 5-7 business days to arrive. Overseas deliveries can take anywhere from 7-16 days. Delivery details will be provided in your confirmation email.

settings.title: What shipping carriers do you use?
settings.answer: We use all major carriers, and local courier partners. You’ll be asked to select a delivery method during checkout.

settings.title: Can I return my product?
settings.answer: We always aim for make sure our customers love our products, but if you do need to return an order, we’re happy to help. Just email us directly and we’ll take you through the process.

settings.title: Can I get my product personalized?
settings.answer: It depends on the creator and the product. All options are outlined on the product page, so look out for customization options there.

settings.title: Any question?
settings.answer: You can contact us through our contact page! We will be happy to assist you.

settings.subheading: Be part of our stories and follow us on Instagram

settings.title: Popup
settings.content: You can use this popup to display some useful information to your customers.

settings.title: ‘MORE THAN JUST A DRESS’
settings.image_subtitle:
Caroline von Stieglitz (Founder & Managing Director)
Christopher Deckert (Managing Director)
settings.content:
IVY & OAK is designed for women who value quality, simplicity, sustainability and style. Our collection is focused on timeless designs, feminine silhouettes and attention to detail.

We manufacture high-quality clothing that is not only inspiring and easy to wear, but also affordable and made to last.

IVY & OAK doesn’t just offer fashion for special moments in life; it offers a distinctive feel, which is what makes our products so unique.

Luxury quality does not need to be expensive

We do not believe in traditional trade fairs, unnecessary middlemen and their associated costs.

We keep it simple.

Our customers only pay for what they ultimately get: a beautiful product in a great quality at a reasonable price.

Our selection of high-quality materials combined with precise workmanship are essential for creating products that are comfortable to wear and remain a wardrobe companion for more than just a season.

settings.title: ‘IT´S ALL ABOUT MOMENTS THIS IS YOURS MADE TO LAST’
‘IN A WORLD FULL OF TRENDS, WE BELIEVE IN STYLE’

settings.content:
We value exceptional manufacturing, luxury quality and great style over fast fashion principles.

We want to create collections that are long lasting in regards to both design and quality.

We source the most beautiful and sustainable, as well as rescued deadstock fabrics and are making sure that our products are responsibly manufactured according to the highest ethical and quality standards.

Additonally our production is limited to avoid filling warehouses with unnecessary overstock.

As we grow we are working hard to lay an even more sustainable foundation for IVY & OAK

Facts

  • IVY & OAK was founded in May 2016
  • The company employs 25 passionate employees: 70% women and 30% men
  • IVY & OAK is active in 28 countries via its online shop and premium retailers
  • Two collections are launched per year, each characterised by timeless style and elegance
  • The head office is based in Berlin

contact

We’d love to hear from you.
Contact us via email or call us:

+49 (0) 30 220 564 200
hello@ivy-oak.com
